name: Drop Suits
description:
An action puzzle card-matching game.

Place pairs of cards to create hands of 4+ of a kind or full houses. Include coins in hands to get points and refill your deck. Game is over when your deck is empty or the game area is filled with cards.

Play with one of 4 decks: French, German, Italian, or Swiss!

Controls

  • Left, right arrows moves cards left, right
  • Down moves cards down faster
  • Up, Z, or Enter rotates cards
  • Esc or Space pauses
  • Click buttons with mouse
